title: Java-the most used programming langauge.
shortDescription: Java is a programming language that produces software for multiple platforms.
fullDescription: Java is a general-purpose computer-programming language that is concurrent, class-based, objec-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

title: React the most used frontend programming langauge.
shortDescription: React is a programming language that produces software for multiple platforms.
fullDescription: React is a general-purpose computer-programming language that is concurrent, class-based, objec-oriented, and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
